episode_desc: You’ve been cordially invited to play the very special first episode of [i]Salty Trivia with Candy Barre[/i]! Viewer discretion is advised.

welcome_before.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Welcome to the very first episode of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre, where the—[##]Hold on, what happened to the teleprompter?[##]It’s gone totally blank! Miles?![##][b]Miles:[/b]Ugh... Stand by, please!

welcome_standby.s: [b]Miles:[/b] Alright, who unplugged the teleprompter?[##][b]Daisy:[/b] It wasn't me, I swear![##][b]Candy:[/b] Come on, Daisy, whenever something bad happens in the studio, 9 times out of 10, it's your prank.[##][b]Miles:[/b] Candy, Daisy was right in front of the audio deck this whole time. I can vouch for her, for once.[##][b]Daisy:[/b] Oh, thank goodness, Miles-ey![##][b]Miles:[/b] For the umpteenth time, stop calling me that.[##][b]Candy:[/b] Oh hey, the teleprompter is back up![##][b]Miles:[/b] Good. Everyone back to battle stations and queue intro!

welcome.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Welcome to the very first episode of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre,[#3500]where the questions are ridiculous but the answers are serious![#6478#]I’m your host, Candy Barre, and I’ll be meting out the questions and sass for today.[#10856#]Now lift your trays to the upright position and prepare for take-off.[#14608#]Or don’t, I’m not your flight attendant.

intermission.s: We’ll be right back after these messages.[#2090#]Not from our sponsors, but these thirsty guys trying to slide into my DMs.[#5782#]I gotta go block those real quick. See ya.[#8270#]

round2.s: Welcome back to Salty Trivia. Remember me?[#2599#]I remember the first time we met like it was only yesterday.[#5832#]Let’s carry on to Round 2!

outro_game.s: From the bottom of my heart, thank you for participating in this very first episode of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre.[#5900#]
